dialog_nodes.title: I want to make an appointment

values.text:
You can view the below link for the details
https://helpwithmybank.gov/get-answers/credit-cards/payments-and-late-payments/faq-credit-cards-payments-late-payments-05.html
I can tell you about our store locations and opening hours, or help you set up an appointment.
You could also ask me to connect you to an agent.
This is open from 09:30 am to 6:00 pm on weekdays and 10:00 am to 5:00 pm on weekends.

values: You're welcome. Just let me know if you need anything else
No problem. Just let me know if you need anything else
My pleasure. Just let me know if you need anything else
